alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued May 17 at 1:06AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 4 AM this morning... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from consistent light to moderate rainfall for the last couple of hours continuing for the next couple of hours. WHERE...American Samoa WHEN...Through 4 AM this morning IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and winds may be heavy and stronger near thunderstorms, respectively. Low visibility during heavy downpours is also possible. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 106 VAVEAO ASO LULU ME 17 2023 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 4 i le vaveao o le Aso... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga i itula ua mavae atu ma o le a fa`aauau pea mo nai isi itula. NOFOAGA...Amerika Samoa atoa. TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 4 i le vaveao nei AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono tutupu sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le palapala ua iai nei. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O timu ma savili e ono mamafa ma agi malosi e lata i faititili. E fa`aitiitia le va`ai mamao i taimi e mamafa ai timuga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
